website_summaries.verdict: While the secure front pocket makes this inexpensive backpack handy, the smaller size and durability concerns make it impractical for everyday use.
pros: Stands out for the front compartment that zips securely and is ideal for carrying pens, pencils, and other small items
Trim is available in several colors
cons: Zippers have been known to break

customer_reviews.title: Warning-Zipper failure ahead!
customer_reviews.text: I am sad about the performance of this bag. My son needs a clear backpack for school. It is required. They are issued a cheap drawstring clear bag that lasts a few weeks. I ordered this one to be ready following the demise of the free one from the school. The free bag from the school made it 4 weeks. This one made it almost 2 weeks before the zipper failed under normal use. The plastic has held up fine in the 2 weeks, but the zipper could not handle being opened and closed with nothing more than a microsoft surface and a folder of paper inside for school days only for 2 weeks. ugh. Can I return this?
customer_reviews.author: ATLJennifer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived ripped
customer_reviews.text: Arrived ripped by the logo. Could've been inspected before shipping out.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Seams Rips
customer_reviews.text: purchased in September for a 7th grader its now December 1st and the seams are coming apart she used daily but only carried composition books, paper and a few pencils as this clear bookbag trend takeover schools I would suggest purchasing a mesh bag over plastic they seem to all rip in some kind of way
customer_reviews.author: Tee Smith

customer_reviews.title: Holds up
customer_reviews.text: For the cost it is excellent. The clear part is very sturdy and it's more spacious then I thought when I ordered it. My last one from a different company began cracking quickly but this one is holding up awesome. I use it every day for work love it!
customer_reviews.author: rtptah

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice size fits a binder well
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my child now the other one wants one too. It is a nice size fits a binder well. My kid is hard on bookbags so i'm giving this a shot it looks pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: No side pockets for water bottles
customer_reviews.text: It is well made and a good size but it does not have side pockets for water bottles.....I should have noticed that.....other than that I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened it, I was pleased to see that it was exactly as pictured and was actually a lot bigger than I imagined once I straightened out the plastic. My school requires clear book bags this year and this was a very last minute purchase but it’s one I’m glad I made. It’s very nice quality for the price and definitely would recommend to others :)
customer_reviews.author: Wilhelmina Irene

customer_reviews.title: Only Lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: At least it lasted 3 months considering that I have heard so many parents at my children school that the backpacks they purchased at school only lasted a couple weeks. However, I am not ordering again, I had to take in consideration that if this backpack lasts only a few months then that means that I would have to buy several of them through the year, fortunately, there's an option to buy protection plan with other brands, which only costs $2 and it covers shipping and all.
customer_reviews.author: NnafTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The school recommended a different brand but I chose this one as ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7th grader as his school began requiring clear backpacks this year. The school recommended a different brand but I chose this one as it was highly rated on Amazon and about the same price. Unfortunately, the zippers broke after only a month of use. Therefore I cannot recommend this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, decent quality, needs more pockets
customer_reviews.text: My son’s school implemented a clear backpack policy this year. This product is of the same quality, yet cheaper, than those sold in stores. My son wishes there were more pockets, specifically side pockets for small items and a zipper pocket inside. This backpack has the large book section and a smaller front pocket. Straps are adjustable and would allow it to fit kids to adults. My son is 6 feet tall and this fits him fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's school now requires clear backpacks to be worn around school. We bought this one in hopes it would fit the bill but it did not last long before breaking. All my daughter carries in it was folders, paper and her soft binder that has only current paperwork in it. Sadly this backpack has now broke right at the seam in only a month an a half of use. The saying is true, you get what you pay for and now Unfortunately I am out the money as the return window for this has passed. I do not recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Thick, clear, durable, yes yes yes
customer_reviews.text: These are way thicker than I expected for a plastic clear backpack. I was worried it wouldn't be able to hold books without tearing but 2 months in and it doesn't even have a rip! Our school required clear backpacks and these were the cheapest ones I could find on short notice. They work great. They have 2 zippers. The only downside is that they are "stiff" at first and if you are careful the zipper probably would break.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Seams come undone easily and often.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Backpack it VERY cute. The color accent makes it fun to coordinate with contents and outfit. Cons: Picture 1: Stitching is poor. stitching is frequently coming undone. Picture 2: Here is another area where stitching came undone and I sewed it back together with fishing line. Picture 3: Plastic isn't very soft or flexible when in below 85 degree weather. Plastic is supple when it's warm. So I have to warm it up to reshape it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura F. Belknap

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Events are going towards the clear plastic option on our city, so getti this as a gift for the man in my life that brings his camera and things along to outdoor events. You know those events...where they give you a million free things and have no place to put them? This will do the trick. Very sturdy, well made, and does t have a horrible smell. Great product. A stage size of a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Go4theguasto

customer_reviews.title: Works alright
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 stars instead of 3 because it seems to hold up better than everyone else's backpacks, but mine is cracking in all sorts of places due to not being filled up and there folding (certain irony to it since it has so little to carry yet that's the reason for the cracking). Works well for $16, lasted me all year long. Everyone else is buying the same one after theirs fail so it seems like a good product, hence the extra star. Just a bit underperforming for what I'd think a $16 backpack could be.
customer_reviews.author: revelation

customer_reviews.title: LOVE It! Sturdy, Good Quality, Thick, Roomy, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I thought this backpack might be sweaty on my back or too big since the straps are not tapered. I was pleasantly surprised. It's comfortable and I don't even notice it's on. I'm an adult and got it for events that require clear bags. Got tired of the totes and wanted my hands free. I LOVE this backpack. And the pink trim ads some girliness to it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken straps. Boo, hiss.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most poorly made product I've ever received via Amazon, and boy, have I bought some crap in the past. This wins. This pack arrived with broken straps, right out of the box. One strap was hanging on for dear life when I removed it from the packaging and gave up the ghost as soon as I put something in the body of the backpack. The other strap had long since given up trying and came completely detached from the body of the backpack itself. I understand getting what you pay for, but this backpack was completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Leah  Busse-Geagan

customer_reviews.title: Good Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to pack his lunches in since he has to have a clear bag. It's sturdy and big enough. The only problem we have is that we can't get the plastic smell to go away and my husband's food ends up tasting like plastic. Great buy if you aren't packing a lunch in it though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price is right but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I'm somewhat disappointed. It's a "you get what you pay for" The zipper is not easy to open and close. Its look like fishing sting that was used to sew it that is the only way to describe it anyway there are loose strands hanging of it everywhere which makes me think it's not going to last long. The straps are comfy, it holds alot and the little splash of color is cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spend more on a better quality.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a cheap backpack from another store known for cheap goods. No problem. Expected to replace it. We haven’t even had this one a month it feels and it’s already ripping. My daughter only carries folders and pencils. It’s only 1st grades Might be good for occasional use. Definitely not for school/everyday.
customer_reviews.author: MamaTeaches

customer_reviews.title: Ripped in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Ripped after less than one month. I knew it would't last forever but less than a month is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: JenP

customer_reviews.title: Did it's job
customer_reviews.text: I was scared that it was going to be cloudy, but it wasn't. There are three reasons that someone would buy this; they need it for a stadium event, their/their child's school requires it, or they like the aesthetic. I was the last one. If you're planning on using it every day, be warned the plastic is thin. I used it for school for about 3 months before the bottom corners ripped (I have had an issue with backpacks ripping in the past so it might be a personal problem). If you're only using it occasionally for sporting events or concerts it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I've had this backpack for several months now. I'm giving it 5 stars because I use it as my every day backpack instead of a fashion backpack that I have. The reasons I like this one is that it has great capacity, including the outer pocket while being very lightweight. If anything happened to this one, I would buy this same model again.
customer_reviews.author: Tele Gurl

customer_reviews.title: only good for a few uses
customer_reviews.text: i bought this backpack to take with me to a music festival. it worked really great until the end when the zippers on the front, smaller pocket broke! i was able to fix it on my own the next day, but i am also not surprised it happened since this product is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: madison

customer_reviews.title: Durable clear plastic backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is very well done that can last for a few month since it’s clear plastic and much more durable than my old clear backpack, which that one only lasts a week due to the holder strap rip off from it. This backpack I bought however has a better holder strap that is durable and can avoid ripping off the clear plastic for a long time. This backpack is useful for work and try to avoid heavy stuff as the clear plastic is not to meant carry heavy stuff but can last long in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Durable Bag
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has held up and my daughter always breaks her bags. It’s study and not cheaply made. I was really impressed at the quality since the price was very reasonable. I highly recommend this item. Also, there is no funky smell to it like other plastic products.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle & Brooke

customer_reviews.title: All clear
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my vacation trip and I can say the security was pleased to make thier job easier. Clear bag made every screening at WDW and Airport so easy worth buying. It's think and very heavy duty like. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at college football games. It’s great! Very roomy. School backpack size. I can easily fit a jacket in here along with the other tings I need. Even with only a few things inside it’s light but plenty sturdy. Plastic is thick and looks like it will hole up over time. Easy to fly through security with this type of bag.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Used this bag several times and have been very happy. Everything about it works well - the straps fit nicely, the zippers are good (even though they are “generic” zippers they work well and aren’t thin or weak) Holds plenty - I had a pair of men’s size 13 running shoes and hoodie and jogger pants in it and still had room to stuff in hats and gloves and misc items.
customer_reviews.author: R. McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Infestation Free
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter likes her backpack. She feels more secure carrying it. It has given her positive attention from her peers who now want a clear backpack. It also correlates with some school requirements for safety and prevention even if her school doesn't require it. Bedbug infestations won't effect her backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Quick Temporary Buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased October 1 it is now Thanksgiving and it has a huge hole on the side...I would literally have to buy one for every quarter in school year... So I’m going to try a different Brand... I have a six grader.. Her three ring binder does fit But adding the rest of her things the bag is stretched out
customer_reviews.author: Sunshyne

customer_reviews.title: Really durable
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to jinx myself! This backpack made it through the whole school year. When my daughter's friends were having to buy another backpack since there's tore. She was still good to go. I really didn't think the backpack was going to make it, with all the stuff she puts in it.
customer_reviews.author: Misha D. Laws

customer_reviews.title: Stitches wont hold.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the ridiculous mandate at school. Bag is as expected. Its falling apart about mid year. It's hard to get clear vinyl to hold a stitch. I did pay for the extended warranty on them and knowing it would be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: My little sister’s middle school just started requiring clear backpacks. While everyone else has the standard black and clear jansport one, she’s happy to have had a color choice. Halfway through the year and it’s still holding up strong, so great value for the money! A bit on the small side, perfect for her usual 3-inch binder and one textbook, but if your child’s school requires a ton of textbooks/binders they may not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work bag
customer_reviews.text: I had to get a clear bag for work. Since I work in embroidery and have to take my supplies with me, I needed a bag big enough to hold my marking pens/pencils, scissors, snips and rulers. This bag is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: A. Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality backpack
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the durability of the backpack. I used on a flight and fulled it to the max. There was no TSA issues for carry-on and I loved being able to view all my items. The straps are comfortable and the zipped is strong. Highly recommend for anyone looking for transparency :D
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not worth it. Broke in like 2-3 weeks, bought two one for me and one for my brother and both broke at like the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has to carry clear bookbag to school, the one she had only lasted a couple of months into the school year. This was a cute color, perfect size and the plastic is heavy duty, which she really needs
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: If you need one, this is a good one to have.
customer_reviews.text: Many venues such a sporting events and music festivals are requiring clear backpacks. Even if they don't yet, you might want one anyway if the alternative is having your bag dumped out and searched by security while you wait.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Holzapfel

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for sporting events that now require clear backpacks ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for sporting events that now require clear backpacks if bringing one in. The price was very reasonable and it is a good adult size with adjustable straps for hubby or me. Just what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Two months into the school year and there is already a hole and a ripped strap. Will be looking for something else, though not many choices now that our school requires clear. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Alison C

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend for Jr high or high school kids
customer_reviews.text: Clear backpacks are mandatory at our kids school. You see “reinforced straps” and think gee what a great buy, yet here we are and within the first month of school the strap has torn from the bag. Wouldn’t recommend for students above elementary because Jr high and high school carry too many things to make this bag a value.
customer_reviews.author: MsMangum253

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Lasted exactly one month, then it ripped at the seams, I replaced it with Jansport mesh backpacks, those seem pretty sturdy but only time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Gabgab

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Disney!
customer_reviews.text: I hate going to parks and arenas and having to have them dig through each pocket of my bag, especially going to Disney and being anxious to get into the park with an even more anxious toddler. The security guards always praise me for bringing these because it makes their job easier as well. The price was a little much as I used to order these for $10 but I guess they’re more in demand now.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa T

customer_reviews.title: This product could come in handy so it's easier for security to look through.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it's a see through backpack and I can fit less stuff in it. I use for work and it has to be a see through so it's easier for security at the gaurd shack to see through my stuff. The don't want to make it a hassle to open a regular bag to look through people's stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Desiongco

customer_reviews.title: It lasted 5 weeks of school
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting this to last too long, and it didn't disappoint. I don't know that you can expect plastic that is sewn together to withstand the weight and use that a backpack is put to, but I was hopeful it would last a bit longer. Oh, well.
customer_reviews.author: kate cross

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for quite a few outings with quite a bit of weight in it and it's holding up beautifully. It is also just as comfortable as any backpack with padded straps.
customer_reviews.author: Mama 2 4 boys

customer_reviews.title: prone to rip
customer_reviews.text: seriously, 3 months into the school year! this bag only carried 1 binder and 1 lunch box... nothing more. YET, the bottom corner is ripped wide open. Unfortunately our school requires clear bags. But I'll be searching for a different maker.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bourque

customer_reviews.title: Build to last!!!
customer_reviews.text: My six year old is hard on his back packs and since I purchased this one I have not seen any cracks, holes or damage. I bought two just in case but I am so please I recommend it to parents who have kids that are hard with their back packs. It may be a little more money but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: JBE

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This bagpack came in outstanding condition. I bought this bagpack for my freshman high schooler. I bought it in August and it was broken by October. Now I don’t expect these clear bagpack to last very long but the whole bottom of this bagpack tipped along the seams. This is no cheap $10 clearbag pack so I expected a little longer last. As far as look it did look good, very nice size and my sons favorite color is green. But I will not purchase this brand again for my busy teenager.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkiti

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable to wear even when full
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work. We are required to use clear bags. It's roomy, and seems very durable so far. It's comfortable to wear even when full.
customer_reviews.author: mrs freeze

customer_reviews.title: ... the trick no more long lines at security can easily see what is in the bag only down side ...
customer_reviews.text: does the trick no more long lines at security can easily see what is in the bag only down side is so does everyone else, straps could be a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Alison Kramer jr

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack for concerts
customer_reviews.text: Some of the bigger concert festivals require a clear bag or backpack. This does the job great. Security can see right in there. I ordered red but got coral (pink) but that's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Clear backpacks seem to crumble and break apart... We've used this one for about 10 months now and it has zero damage. Thanks for an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Siere2014

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 5 months
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted to love this backpack, but it is already broken. The zipper is broken and there is a hole in it after only five months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the pink !
customer_reviews.text: The back pack is super cute. I get complements on it all the time. HOWEVER, i had that it doesnt keep its shape. Im OCD and continuously shape it back to a perfect square 😂
customer_reviews.author: Diane W. Davis

customer_reviews.title: You need 2 to last a school year
customer_reviews.text: Clear backpacks required for school so this backpack is great because it satisfies that rule. However, it takes 2 backpacks to last a school year. At this price, though 2 of these are cheaper than the slightly more sturdy ones that last a whole school year.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Burrus

customer_reviews.title: Needed for work
customer_reviews.text: I work at an NFL stadium, so a clear bag is needed. I wanted a backpack & the reinforced straps were important. Nice smaller compartment too.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really thick plastic for the backpack. I needed a see through bag to hold done medical supplies and this is perfect. I would not change a single thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: well made great quality & product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my young adult son. Seems well put together. He takes it camp I ng & hiking and it has held together well, he's very happy with his purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lauree B

customer_reviews.title: Ripped four months in
customer_reviews.text: The shoulder straps tore four months in. Soon, the zipper broke, then the bottom threading, and then the front zipper. The zippers' metal bit broke, not the line. I wouldn't recommend this for long-term use, but if it's for light swimming gear, maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Dain

customer_reviews.title: Great to prevent toy smuggling to school.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter refused to stop trying to smuggle toys and other classroom distractions to school so we got her this backpack. It's been great and way more durable than the one we had to buy last year.
customer_reviews.author: Shezameron

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Needed a clear backpack for a conference and this did not disappoint. It held up well with everything that was stuffed into it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: My job requires me to use a clear backpack to bring my items, 8 months in and no signs of wear and being through abuse. Great product for the price. Only giving it 4 stars because I wish it had more pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not A Bookbag For School Items
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. The bag is not strong enough for any items that have any weight to it. Definitely not books. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great pack pack. My daughter has used for some months and still holds its weight.get a lot of compliments because you can see everything needed easily for school.
customer_reviews.author: Mar H

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for when my kids school switched over to see through backpacks. These are really well made and I am sure they will last all year. Purchased for a 1st and 3rd grader.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy L. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last for daily school use....
customer_reviews.text: My son used it as his school backpack for 4 weeks and it is tearing at the seams. He carries 2 binders, some folders and a few pens & pencils - no textbooks. I was disappointed that it didn’t last longer than that. Might work for someone that only uses on occasion but not sturdy enough for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Passmore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for carrying all of my belongings into the baseball stadium where I work. Super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting a sturdy backpack for the price I paid. It seems very well made but will find out how it holds up when school starts.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was just what I needed. It arrived quickly and served me well for the event I needed it for. Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but durable
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with this is size. It's pretty durable and thick plastic however it's a bit small considering I bought it for a high schooler.
customer_reviews.author: The Isreal's

customer_reviews.title: Strap and zipper color don’t match
customer_reviews.text: I bought a backpack with blue straps and thought the zipper would be blue too but they are actually black. I wanted to return and get the black one (so it would match), but didn’t have time because I needed to use it 2 days later... so watch out for the color match if that is important to you...
customer_reviews.author: onlineshopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Definitely clear
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I ordered it for my kids because is was supposed to be a requirement for school,then at the last minute the school changed the policy and my kids wanted to use different backpacks, so I can't really say how well these backpacks hold up.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Clear. Durable. Easy clean.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted all school year and could continue use. (Used by my tiny daughter, age 4yrs.) Clear and Easy clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany G.

customer_reviews.title: Small for middle school
customer_reviews.text: Small for middle schools, my son is in 7th grade and he carries at least 3 1" folders plus notebooks, this backpack lasted about 2 month of daily heavy used, on the other hand shipping was really quick 5 starts on that
customer_reviews.author: Dayana Perez

customer_reviews.title: The sturdiest clear backpack we have seen yet
customer_reviews.text: Our kids’ school enforces a clear backpack policy. This is the third backpack we have bought this school year and is by far the sturdiest one! We bought two and they’re both still intact after a couple of months of use.
customer_reviews.author: TAM

customer_reviews.title: rebuy
customer_reviews.text: this is actually the second time I purchase it for my daughter and she really likes them because they don't brake from straps like others and she carries lots stuff for school!! WORTH THE BUY !!!
customer_reviews.author: blanca

customer_reviews.title: would really like a replacement
customer_reviews.text: My bag tore on the 1st day i used it! would really like a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney  Newsome

customer_reviews.title: great for parents with problem children
customer_reviews.text: The package came undamaged and the item was in perfect condition. great for children that like to hide things in their bag.
customer_reviews.author: Devin spencer

customer_reviews.title: It ok
customer_reviews.text: Works well unfortunately even after having it for about a month it’s still super stiff. Works for what we got it for but definitely different from a normal backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi palbicki

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The perfect bag for a music festival! Just right for necessities when you can’t carry in a regular bag. This was a great bag for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Is it is exactly how it’s pictured except the back of the blue straps have gray. I love the bag and so does my job :)
customer_reviews.author: Shawna K.

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: I've bought probably 8 of these in the past and they fall apart! This one however is very durable so glad I made the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: staci thornton

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended if you plan to go through security multiple times... museums, airports, etc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 50% success so far
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks of use for school, the strap disconnected on one of the back packs. We had purchased two. The second one is fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Robin A Preston

customer_reviews.title: Cleat backpack
customer_reviews.text: As far as a clear backpack goes it seems to do the job. Required at my kiddos school, holds all that is needed and so far has held up well. Been in use for about two months.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Olsen

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Came in quickly and advertisement was spot on. A few threads came out but fixed at home with needle and thread. Can’t complain for a few bucks
customer_reviews.author: Anthony u.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality product
customer_reviews.text: Please dont waste money on this one, product quality is very very bad, returning it right away.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Not like the photo.
customer_reviews.text: Not what we were looking for. Looked cheap and smalle than pictured.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Major League Baseball games
customer_reviews.text: Although it wasn’t required at the Cubs game we recently attended it came in handy going through security. The guard complimented my bag, looked all around it from the outside without having to dig through it. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this cute backpack!  It’s huge!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought! I love this backpack. You can get everything in it! I’m using it for camping. I can find what I want easily. No hunting around for items now!
customer_reviews.author: Truth Teller

customer_reviews.title: Contriban
customer_reviews.text: Good bag for my son perfect for his neck of the woods do to the crappy school district
customer_reviews.author: Alcides

customer_reviews.title: Clear backpack with green straps
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who needs a clear bag for his job. We got him the one with the green straps and he really likes it. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Cute but breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: Cute but breaks easily. Ripped at the seam and bottom after 1st week of school carrying 2 books and large binder
customer_reviews.author: KAYLA

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and does it well
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice useful bookbag. It does not feel cheap either. Good for those in need of a transparent bag.
customer_reviews.author: Hom Tanks

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, durable backpack to last to the end of the school year!!
customer_reviews.text: More durability then expected. It's hard to tell untill you can feel the thickness of the plastic backpack yourself. I believe the kids will make it work for the remainder of the school year!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME product, not a single bad thing about it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Sturdy and perfect for my first grader. No more messy bags or questions about the school binder or library books, etc. Got it at a great price and never been happier with a school backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Creepingtime

customer_reviews.title: Great experience!
customer_reviews.text: This works beautifully for taking my lunch and other things to work at my Correctional Facility.
customer_reviews.author: shadylady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for anything needed carried.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty bags that are not plastic welded, they are nylon stiched. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

product_meta.title: Clear Backpack With Reinforced Straps & Front Accessory Pocket - Perfect for School, Security, Sporting Events
feature_bullets: This durable and transparent backpack is constructed from quality PVC material, making it the ideal clear backpack for schools, security, sporting events and much more!
Size: H 17" x W 12" x D 5.5" Perfect for ages 8+ and various needs.
The main compartment dual zipper system keeps your items secure and is perfect for carrying multiple books, folders, water bottles and more.
Front Zipper Accessory Pocket - Perfect for storing pens, calculator and much more.
Reinforced Padded Straps - Designed to provide maximum comfort and durability to ensure long lasting use.
